title: List CLI commands
description: Read cmd/ticker/main.go and list all subcommands defined.
closed_reason: Read cmd/ticker/main.go. Found 4 subcommands: (1) run [epic-id] - Run an epic with AI agent, (2) resume <checkpoint-id> - Resume from checkpoint, (3) checkpoints [epic-id] - List available checkpoints, (4) upgrade - Upgrade ticker to latest version. Root command 'ticker' also available.
